start.headline: Welcome!
start.text: Congrulations! You got a job as a wildlife photographer. Your first assignment is to photograph only one animal. Good luck!

nextLevel.headline: Well done!
nextLevel.text: There's another assignment for you. One more animal this time.

gameOver.headline: You're fired!
gameOver.text: That didn't go very well, did it? You'd better stay focused next time.
